group_1.textRight: Oh my…Yuna? What a coincidence@seeing you here.

group_1.textLeft: Tamaki…

group_1.textRight: Are you out shopping?

group_1.textLeft: …Indeed. I'm going to accompany@my father to dinner tomorrow,
but I'd rather wear something that@isn't too formal.
I thought that a department store would be a good@place to look, but haven't found anything suitable…

group_1.textRight: I see, so that's it…@[chara:100151:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100151:motion_100][chara:100151:cheek_0][chara:100151:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:100151:lipSynch_1]Um, if you'd like, maybe I could help?

group_1.textLeft: Pardon…?

group_1.textRight: I'm sure that Yachiyo would be able@to think of a good place to check.
I'll give her a call and find out,@and then I can take you there…!

group_1.textLeft: …Well, I suppose I'll take you up@on that offer…

group_1.textRight: …I thought so back when you first@tried them on,
but those clothes look really nice on you!

group_1.textLeft: Thank you…
As a token of appreciation for introducing@me to such a nice shop,
I'd like to do something for you in return…

group_1.textRight: Oh, it's okay… Please don't worry about it.
I'm here for you if you're ever in trouble.

group_1.textLeft: …That doesn't sit quite right with me,@though…

group_1.textRight: Hm…
In that case, I want to know what sorts@of things you like, Yuna.

group_1.textLeft: …You want to know what I like…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
We're not very familiar with each other yet,
so I'd like to learn a little more about you…

group_1.textLeft: …[wait:1.0][chara:102150:cheek_0][chara:102150:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:102150:lipSynch_1]Hmhm.
Very well, then…
It's hardly the right season for this,
but since we're here, allow me to@take you out for a treat.

group_1.textRight: A treat…?
Are we getting ice cream?

group_1.textLeft: Yes… It's my favorite food…
This shop is the best I've found recently.
However…
It's colder than I thought.@Should we call it off?

group_1.textRight: No! We came all this way, so I'd like to@get something to eat.

group_1.textLeft: Alright… Well, I'll go buy it, then…

group_1.textRight: Mm…! So good!

group_1.textLeft: I'm glad you enjoy it…
They seem to be very particular about their@ingredients, and the flavors are all delicious…

group_1.textRight: Huh…
There's so much variety, I don't think@I'd ever get tired of coming here.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed… I could come here every day@in the summer.

group_1.textRight: Hehe…
Then when summer's here, we should@stop by together again!

group_1.textLeft: …Eh?

group_1.textRight: It already tastes great, even when@it's cold out.
I bet it'll be even better on a hot day.

group_1.textLeft: …O-of course…
(…Tamaki, you take it for granted…)
(…that there will even be a "next" summer…)

group_1.textRight: Oh, um… Do you not want to…?

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not it…
You're right… We certainly should@come back here again.
(Together…with everyone, for sure.)
…Hmhm. I feel a bit warmer now…
